title: Napkin, ca. 1906
medium:
Medium: linen. Quality no. 810 (finest the company produced)
Technique: damask
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 71 x 70 cm (27 15/16 x 27 9/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Alice Baldwin Beer Memorial Fund
description:
Field: 4 butterflies form a small square and are repeated for an 11 3/4 in. square.
Borders: butterflies. 
"DV" in each corner. Openwork (eyelet) monogram in one corner: "OV".

tombstone.epitaph:
